decision_conditions: The proposed works would have a negative impact upon the tree's long-term health, and the tree's amenity value.

The reasons for work put forward for the current application seek to address alleged safety issues and alleged risk of damage to property. Yet, the application form has "No" selected, when asked if the reasons for carrying out the proposed works are due to the condition of the tree, and the application form also has "No" selected, when asked if the reasons for carrying out the proposed works are because of alleged damage to property. By the selection of "No" to these questions, the requirement to submit substantiating evidence has been evaded, and in the absence of sufficient supporting evidence to demonstrate the necessity of the proposals, the stated reasons for the work are considered unjustified.
